body: Hey, people! I'm currently reading "Thinking fast and slow by Daniel Kanneman! Have anyone read this book?"

comments.body: Sure! It's a great book! I wanted to read it all during summer holidays but I didn't make it in time. Now I have to study a lot. I'll finish it in the winter!
